title: Karachi’s DHA, some other areas face 24-hour gas shutdown today - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KARACHI: Residents of Defence Housing Authority and some other areas will face a 24-hour gas shutdown on Monday (today).

The Sui Southern Gas Company announced that work to reroute a 24-inch diameter pipeline had begun on Sunday night and it was likely to be completed on Monday evening.

“Gas supply will remain suspended in all DHA phases, Clifton Blocks 3, 5 and 6, Defence View, Akhtar Colony, Azam Basti and Qayyumabad until 10pm Monday,” the utility said.

Published in Dawn, August 11th, 2025
